body.p:
To his Excellency Thomas Bramlette
Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky

We the undersigned would most respectfully represent to your honor that at the March Term of the Bath Circuit Court 1862 that Geo Hatton was fined in said court $27- and which fine Joseph Toy replevined We would state that the said George Hatton is in the Service of the United States in the 24th Ky Regiment Infty, and has been in the service for more than 2 years.. We would petition your Excellency to remit said fine as Mr Toy is a poor hard working ^& Loyal^ man and it would go hard with him to pay it We think that this case deserves executive clemency, and should be interposed in behalf of our brave soldiers in the field-

All of which is respectfully submitted
Owingsville Ky Dec 28th 1863

V. B. Young C. B. C. C
John E. Rice
E. V. Brother Jury trustee B Cir
B D Lacy
Eli W. Fleming
F. Donaldson
Wm Richards
R. L. Tipton
J. H. Richard
J. J. Lightfoot
